item.description:
Everyone,

Will has set up a karaoke night for this upcoming Friday night. I'm told that singing is a great way to lose weight, so if you ate too much turkey during Thanksgiving, this is a great way to use some energy! Also, please don't worry about your singing skills - I am proud to say that I have a terrible singing voice, but I still love a great night of karaoke.

Name: Golden Leaf (金葉居)
Address: 20 Hudson st., (next to Ginza restaurant in chinatown)
http://maps.google.co...

The closest train station near Golden Leaf is the Chinatown T stop on the Orange Line. Leaving the train station, you will find yourself on Washington Street. Continue to walk down Washington Street, and take a right onto Kneeland St. Follow Kneeland street for 4 blocks until you see Hudson Street on your left. Golden Leaf is located at the entrance to Hudson st.

The cost of the event will depend on the number of people attending. I am setting the price at $20 per person, but it will be much cheaper if we can get many people to attend (as low as $7 if 25 people attend).

Please e-mail me if you have any questions. See you all there!

Rob
item.name: Karaoke Night @ Golden Leaf in Chinatown
